page.title: 13CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: We asked KATHERINE SPOONER what her favourite game was she repiled HOP SCOTCH to play{HOPSCOTCH}you have a number grid with ten numbers you can have any number of people playing apart from one,each person has a stone and they have to throw it to number one and they have to hop and jump up to number ten missing then jump back to number one if the stones lands on the wrong side of it then its the next persons go. But if the stone lands on the line of the grid then they can take it again this is a game to be played outside a stone suface .
